title: Ancient DNA Analysis (nf-core/eager)
description: Analyze ancient and degraded DNA from archaeological samples using nf-core/eager. Handles unique challenges of ancient DNA including short fragments, damage patterns, and contamination assessment for paleogenomics and evolutionary studies.
content:
Ancient DNA Analysis

The nf-core/eager pipeline analyzes ancient and degraded DNA from archaeological and paleontological samples, handling unique challenges like DNA damage, short fragments, and contamination.

Applications

  • Human Evolution: Ancient human genomes (Neanderthals, Denisovans)
  • Archaeology: Study past populations and migrations
  • Paleogenomics: Extinct species genomics
  • Forensics: Degraded DNA from forensic samples
  • Museum Specimens: Historical DNA from preserved samples

Ancient DNA Features

  • DNA damage assessment and repair
  • Short fragment handling
  • Contamination estimation
  • Deduplication for ancient DNA
  • Sex determination from skeletal remains

Perfect for: Archaeologists • Paleogeneticists • Evolutionary biologists • Museum researchers
